data.title: [1508522766] Episode 7: Don't Lose Traffic to Youtube!
data.description: If you are sending traffic to YouTube to view your videos, you are actually losing your valuable traffic. data.title: [1508522766] California Cycleworks. A TVPage Case Study.
data.description: California Cycleworks specializes in the manufacture, distribution and retail of high quality aftermarket parts for Ducati motorcycles. Cycleworks markets and sells its products to both consumers and distributors, globally. In fact, some of the most active regions include Australia, Canada and of course, Italy -- the home of Ducati SpA.

data.title: [1508522766] Jerome's Furniture. A TVPage Case Study.
data.description: Jerome's TVPage Video Shopping Experience is an important part in making the brand a media company as much as a furniture retailer, or, more precisely, intertwining the two. The website presents the retailer's commercials, properly organized, with which viewers can engage and convert to sales. Jerome's literally integrated shopping INTO the video experience, something they had never before thought possible, creating a revolutionary new avenue to sell their product.

data.title: [1508522766] Char-Broil. A TVPage Case Study.
data.description: Char-Broil TV is the home of all Char-Broil's video content. Visitors can browse, watch and get engaged with Char-Broil content, while they shop! This is an excellent example of how a company can create a video section on their website, and not send visitors to YouTube, where they can be lost. Would you send a customer out of your store?

data.title: [1508522766] TVPage - Shoppable Video For Merchants
data.description:
TVPage is a platform that enables online merchants to create shoppable video experiences that can be embedded in their store, on average, driving a 32% increase in conversion rate and a 42% increase in average order value!

Request a demo today: https://www.tvpage.com/request-demo
